skills_dictionary.Python: High-level programming language used for data analysis, machine learning, and backend development.
skills_dictionary.SQL: Language for querying and managing relational databases.
skills_dictionary.Pandas: Python library for data analysis and manipulation.
skills_dictionary.Scikit-learn: Python ML library for classification, regression, and clustering.
skills_dictionary.TensorFlow: Deep learning framework for building neural networks.
skills_dictionary.PyTorch: Popular deep learning library for research and production.
skills_dictionary.AWS: Amazon Web Services cloud platform for hosting and deployment.
skills_dictionary.GCP: Google Cloud Platform for cloud computing services.
skills_dictionary.Kubernetes: Container orchestration system for managing microservices.
skills_dictionary.Tableau: Business intelligence tool for interactive data visualization.
skills_dictionary.Power BI: Microsoft tool for business analytics and visualization.
skills_dictionary.Excel: Spreadsheet software widely used for analysis and reporting.
skills_dictionary.Java: General-purpose programming language often used in enterprise apps.

job_descriptions.title: Data Analyst
job_descriptions.description: We are looking for a Data Analyst to collect, clean, and analyze datasets, generating insights to support business decisions.

job_descriptions.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job_descriptions.description: You will design, train, and deploy ML models for real-world applications, collaborating with research and production teams.

job_descriptions.title: Business Intelligence Developer
job_descriptions.description: Responsible for developing BI dashboards, managing data pipelines, and ensuring accurate business reporting.

job_descriptions.title: Cloud Engineer
job_descriptions.description: Focus on designing and managing cloud infrastructure, automating deployments, and ensuring scalability of applications.

job_descriptions.title: Full Stack Developer
job_descriptions.description: Build and maintain scalable web applications, working across backend and frontend systems.
